Summary: Saw fast moving lights on horizon while camping.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fruita
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband & i were camping in western utah, blm land, in the desert in our camper. it was early evening and dark & we noticed flashing colored lights on the horizon, by the la sal mountains, about 15 miles from us. it was just weird to see that so far away & so low and where there would be no traffic. then the next morning, a plane flew over us in that direction, very low, it was a c130 plane. thats' about it. it's just that about 19 years before that when we were camping in pikes peak nat'l forest colorado with our boys, we all were looking up at the sky at night & saw at least 3 or 4 very fast flashing lights high in the sky, crisscrossing and kept it up. but they were so fast & moved in different directions so fast it was just unbelievable and we didn't know what that was. we all saw them go across the sky for about 1\2 hour to an hour. saw them the next night too. that was before we had ever even heard about how the ufo's are fast & change directions fast also. it was different to see the lights down low on the horizon unlike up in the sky like we had 19 years ago but they seemed like the same.
